类的使用
org.springframework.http.HttpEntity

  • 使用HttpEntity的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.http
    Contains a basic abstraction over client/server-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.client
    Contains an abstraction over client-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.converter
    Provides an HttpMessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and HTTP input/output messages.
    org.springframework.web.client
    Core package of the client-side web support.

    • org.springframework.http中HttpEntity的使用

      org.springframework.http中HttpEntity的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  RequestEntity<T>
      Extension of HttpEntity that adds a method and uri.
      class  ResponseEntity<T>
      Extension of HttpEntity that adds a HttpStatus status code.
      声明为HttpEntity的org.springframework.http中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static HttpEntity<?> HttpEntity.EMPTY
      The empty HttpEntity, with no body or headers.

    • org.springframework.http.client中HttpEntity的使用

      org.springframework.http.client中HttpEntity的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MultipartBodyBuilder.PublisherEntity<T,P extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>>
      Specialization of HttpEntity for use with a Publisher-based body, for which we also need to keep track of the element type.
      返回变量类型为HttpEntity的类型的org.springframework.http.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MultiValueMap<java.lang.String,HttpEntity<?>> MultipartBodyBuilder.build()
      Return a MultiValueMap with the configured parts.

    • org.springframework.http.converter中HttpEntity的使用

      返回HttpEntity的org.springframework.http.converter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected HttpEntity<?> FormHttpMessageConverter.getHttpEntity(java.lang.Object part)
      Return an HttpEntity for the given part Object.
